bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Practice What You Preach Privacy Protection Promotion Act - Requires all Federal agencies using electronic media in carrying out their activities to comply with Federal Trade Commission (FTC) rules and guidelines for the protection of persons subject to information gathering through such media. Requires such compliance before the FTC issues a final enforcement policy statement applicable to the private sector.
